Title: B/ill
Writer: Kevin Cecil (teleplay by), Armando Iannucci (created by), Andy Riley (teleplay by), Tony Roche (teleplay by), Armando Iannucci (story by), Kevin Cecil (story by), Andy Riley (story by), Tony Roche (story by)
Actors: Julia Louis-Dreyfus, Anna Chlumsky, Tony Hale, Reid Scott
Plot: Gary sets up a secret meeting with Dan and Amy to persuade them to lobby against Selina's bill.
